card.name: Rilken Forcefield Keeper
card.text: Rilken Forcefield Keeper gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control. Sacrifice Rilken Forcefield Keeper: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Final Symphony
card.text: When Final Symphony enters, exile another target nonland permanent until Final Symphony leaves the battlefield. When Final Symphony leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Morning's Warden
card.text: Lifelink Whenever Morning's Warden becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, exile target creature that player controls.

card.name: Alia's Enforcer
card.text: As long as you have 25 or more life, Alia's Enforcer gets +2/+2 and gains flying. Whenever an artifact or enchantment you control enters, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Lockdown
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, put a quest counter on Lockdown. As long as there are three or more quest counters on Lockdown, creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controller's untap steps.

card.name: Consort of Morning
card.text: Lifelink Experience (Whenever this creature attacks, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Benevolent Malach
card.text: Flying When Benevolent Malach enters, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. Sacrifice Benevolent Malach: Artifacts you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Polgek Artisan
card.text: When Polgek Artisan enters, create an X/X colorless Juggernaut artifact creature token, where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments you control.

card.name: Eager Observer
card.text: Eager Observer gets +1/+1 as long as you control an artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Rilken Preserver
card.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever Rilken Preserver attacks, you may exile target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Align the Astrolabe
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a quest counter on Align the Astrolabe. At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token for each three quest counters on Align the Astrolabe.

card.name: Polgek Restorationist
card.text: When Polgek Restorationist enters, you may return target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Protector of the League
card.text: Flying Experience (Whenever this creature attacks, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Other creatures you control get +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on Protector of the League.

card.name: Blessing of Morning
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens, then you gain life equal to the number of artifacts and enchantments you control.

card.name: Matron of Machines
card.text: When Matron of Machines dies, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. {3}{W}, Exile Matron of Machines from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Citywide Automation
card.text: When Citywide Automation enters, create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens. {2}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Citywide Automation: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Enori Duelist
card.text: Double strike Experience (Whenever this creature attacks, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Disassociate
card.text: When Disassociate enters, exile target creature until Disassociate leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Banish Through the Veil
card.text: Destroy all creatures. Exile all graveyards.

card.name: Self Replication
card.text: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. If you control an artifact, create two of those tokens instead.

card.name: Nina, Master of Arms
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may attach target Equipment you control to Nina, Master of Arms. Whenever Nina attacks, the next artifact spell you cast this turn costs {RW}{RW} less to cast. (This can reduce the amount of generic mana you pay.)

card.name: Seek Perfection
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, put a quest counter on Seek Perfection. At the beginning of each end step, if Seek Perfection has four or more quest counters on it, exile target permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Crystallized Hope
card.text: You gain 3 life. Choose one — • You gain 3 life. • Draw a card.

card.name: Dawnwisp Vents
card.text: At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, if you control three or more enchantments, choose target creature. Prevent all combat damage that creature would deal this turn. {2}{W}: You gain 2 life and scry 1.

card.name: Purging Light
card.text: Choose one — • Purging Light deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead. • Exile target enchantment.

card.name: Open the Secret Paths
card.text: Exile two target permanents you control, then return them to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Resonating Force
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then you may pay {U}{U}. If you do, copy Resonating Force and you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Herald of Wisdom
card.text: Flash When Herald of Wisdom enters, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Disable
card.text: Counter target spell or activated ability. If an activated ability of an artifact was countered this way, put that permanent on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Surmise Reality's Limits
card.text: Target player draws X cards.

card.name: Unite the Powergrid
card.text: Each artifact you control has all the activated abilities of other artifacts you control.

card.name: Veilborn Meddler
card.text: Flash When Veilborn Meddler enters, counter target spell if its mana value is less than or equal to Veilborn Meddler's power. Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Veilborn Meddler.

card.name: Imitator of Drakes
card.text: Imitator of Drakes has flying as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}{U}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Imitator of Drakes.

card.name: Terraformer's Globe
card.text: When Terraformer's Globe enters, draw a card. {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Watch Time Slip Away
card.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Artistic Vision
card.text: When Artistic Vision enters, create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may tap two untapped artifacts you control. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copies.

card.name: Marin Polgek, Academy Heiress
card.text: Marin Polgek, Academy Heiress has hexproof as long as you control three or more enchantments. {1{W}U}{WU}: Create a token that's a copy of target enchantment you control.

card.name: Avid Researcher
card.text: Eureka! (At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.) {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Iterative Designer
card.text: Eureka! (At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

card.name: Unified Theory
card.text: If you would draw a card, you may return an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand instead. {U}: Draw three cards.

card.name: Reality Rewoven
card.text: Choose one or both — • Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. • Each player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. Exile Reality Rewoven.

card.name: Fractal Meditation
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Reclusive Archmage
card.text: Flash {U}, Return another creature you control to its owner's hand: Reclusive Archmage can't be blocked this turn and gains hexproof until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Reconsider
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Draw a card.

card.name: Artificer's Prowess
card.text: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. If you control six or more artifacts, create a 6/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token instead. Draw a card.

card.name: Reinvent
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. Search your library for an artifact creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Observer of Secret Paths
card.text: Flash Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Observer of Secret Paths. It can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: The Clocktower Project
card.text: When The Clocktower Project enters, create a tapped colorless Powercell artifact token with "{T}: Add {C}." Tap seven untapped artifacts you control: Draw three cards.

card.name: Imagine
card.text: Shuffle any number of cards from your graveyard into your library. Scry 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Frozen Moment
card.text: This spell costs {4} less to cast if a player attacked with four or more creatures this turn. End the turn.

card.name: Volta, Construct Consultant
card.text: Eureka! (At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.)

card.name: Duress
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Channeler of the Veil
card.text: When Channeler of the Veil enters, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Secret Thief
card.text: Sabotage — Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn. {B}{B}{B}: Secret Thief gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Atychiphobia
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Iken Company Nightwalker
card.text: Flash Whenever Iken Company Nightwalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Veilborn Stalker
card.text: Menace Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Veilborn Stalker.

card.name: Irika, Wielder of Secrets
card.text: Flash Deathtouch, lifelink Whenever Irika, Wielder of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {UB}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Veilcrossed Twins
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Draw a card. {4}{B}{B}, {T}: Return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a veil counter on it. That permanent gains "If this permanent would leave the battlefield, exile it instead."

card.name: Veilborn Hunter
card.text: {B}: Veilborn Hunter gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice another creature: Veilborn Hunter gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Beckoner of Horrors
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. Whenever one or more counters are put on an enchantment you control, you gain 1 life and each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Ambitious Necromancer
card.text: Sabotage — Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Propagation Plant
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. When you do, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another kind of a counter already there.)

card.name: Sealer of Pacts
card.text: Trample When Sealer of Pacts enters, sacrifice any number of permanents, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Glimpse the Veil
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

card.name: Fallback Plan
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, put a quest counter on Fallback Plan. Remove four quest counters from Fallback Plan and sacrifice it: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Beckon Darkness
card.text: Sabotage — Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, put a quest counter on Beckon Darkness. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Beckon Darkness has four or more quest counters on it, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Corrupted Knowledge
card.text: Surveil 2, then you draw a card and you lose 1 life. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) {2}{B}, Exile Corrupted Knowledge from your graveyard: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Monstrous Hunter
card.text: When Monstrous Hunter enters, destroy up to one target creature. At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Sesilius, Chosen Speaker
card.text: Draw a card unless an opponent pays 2 life.

card.name: Gate to the Beyond
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a quest counter on Gate to the Beyond. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are three or more quest counters on Gate to the Beyond, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. Then if there are six or more quest counters on it, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Slay the Unkillable
card.text: This spell costs {1}{B} less to cast if it targets a creature with indestructible. Exile target creature.

card.name: Violent Collapse
card.text: All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Inevitable Future
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature and/or planeswalker card in your graveyard. Return target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Disqualify
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Draw a card.

card.name: Power From Beyond
card.text: You may put a card you own from outside the game into your hand. Add {B}{B}. You may cast only one more spell this turn. Exile Power From Beyond.

card.name: Mastery of the Veil
card.text: Choose five. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. • You draw a card and you lose 1 life. • Each opponent loses 2 life. • Each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Scorch
card.text: Scorch deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Forgemaster's Charm
card.text: Choose one — • Forgemaster's Charm deals X damage to target creature. • Destroy X target artifacts. • Create an X/X colorless Juggernaut artifact creature token.

card.name: Speedreading
card.text: Exile up to three target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast cards exiled this way. Exile Speedreading.

card.name: Dedicated Weaponsmith
card.text: Experience (Whenever this creature attacks, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever a player activates an ability of an artifact, creature, or land, if it isn't a mana ability, Dedicated Weaponsmith deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Fento, Nova Crusader
card.text: {RG}: Fento, Nova Crusader gains haste and trample until end of turn. Whenever Fento, Nova Crusader attacks, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. If you do, sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Novaheart Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Novaheart Dragon enters or attacks, you may take an extra turn after this one. If you do, you lose the game at the beginning of that turn's end step.

card.name: Mirrorcast Battlemage
card.text: Sabotage — Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Mirrorcast Battlemage. Remove three +1/+1 counters from Mirrorcast Battlemage: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Arcane Metalcrafter
card.text: Whenever Arcane Metalcrafter or another Wizard you control attacks, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token that's tapped and attacking. Whenever a Construct you control dies, Arcane Metalcrafter deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Pyromantic Expertise
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn. • Pyromantic Expertise deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Instant of Brilliance
card.text: Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell this turn, Instant of Brilliance deals 1 damage to each opponent. Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Claimed by the Veil
card.text: This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a permanent with mana value 3 or less. Gain control of target nonland permanent until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Artisan of Brutality
card.text: Sabotage — Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, Artisan of Brutality gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Polgek Songcrafter
card.text: Whenever Polgek Songcrafter attacks, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If you control five or more attacking creatures, choose up to one target creature the defending player controls. That creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Martial Maestro
card.text: First strike Whenever Martial Maestro attacks, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Eleventh Hour Breakthrough
card.text: Create three tapped colorless Powercell artifact tokens with "{T}: Add {C}." Then untap all artifacts you control. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice three artifacts.

card.name: Vitin Blastgear
Bottled Lightning
card.text: Eureka! (At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.) When Bottled Lightning enters, it deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1.

card.name: Philosophy of Fire
card.text: Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent this turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Siraj, Interplanar Thief
card.text: Gain control of up to one target noncreature permanent you don't control. Untap it.

card.name: Maniacal Elementalist
card.text: Menace Experience (Whenever this creature attacks, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Flamecloaked Artisan
card.text: Experience (Whenever this creature attacks, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever Flamecloaked Artisan attacks, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card with mana value less than Flamecloaked Artisan's power, you may cast it this turn, and you may cast it as though it had flash.

card.name: Vitin Forgemaster
card.text: Eureka! (At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.) Whenever an artifact you control enters, up to two target creatures get +1/+0 and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Careless Violence
card.text: Careless Violence deals 2 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Meteor Harbinger
card.text: When Meteor Harbinger enters, choose one — • Meteor Harbinger deals 2 damage to each creature. • Each player sacrifices two lands. • Meteor Harbinger deals 2 damage to each of two target players or planeswalkers.

card.name: Endless Assembly
card.text: Artifact creatures you control have haste. At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. If you control six or more artifacts, create a 6/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token instead. Tokens created this way attack this turn if able.

card.name: Calamity Dragon
card.text: Flying When Calamity Dragon enters, it deals 2 damage to each creature you don't control. Whenever a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, Calamity Dragon deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Queen of Unclaimed Lands
card.text: Whenever you tap a land for mana, add an additional one mana of any color. {8}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Kati Evalin, World Wanderer
card.text: If one or more counters would be put on another permanent you control, put that many counters plus one on that permanent instead.

card.name: Backwoods Cultivator
card.text: When Backwoods Cultivator enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. When Backwoods Cultivator dies, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another kind of a counter already there.)

card.name: Telvim Sculptor
card.text: {G}{G}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control that entered this turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Reclamation Grovesculptor
card.text: Whenever Reclamation Grovesculptor enters or attacks, put a growth counter on target noncreature permanent. It becomes a colorless Forest land and loses all other card types and land types.

card.name: Flamboyant Inventor
card.text: When Flamboyant Inventor enters, create a tapped colorless Powercell artifact token with "{T}: Add {C}." At the beginning of each combat, you may have Powercells you control become 2/2 Construct creatures with vigilance in addition to their other types until end of turn.

card.name: Seeker of Untouched Beauty
card.text: As long as you control four or more lands, Seeker of Untouched Beauty gets +2/+2 and has trample. When Seeker of Untouched Beauty dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Powercell Engineer
card.text: When Powercell Engineer enters, create a tapped colorless Powercell artifact token with "{T}: Add {C}."

card.name: Ravenous Hydra
card.text: Ravenous Hydra enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Ravenous Hydra deals combat damage, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another kind of a counter already there.)

card.name: Advanced Powercell
card.text: Advanced Powercell enters tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Legends Remembered
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Telvim Explorer
card.text: Whenever a land you control enters, create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens. {4}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

card.name: The Feller of Greatwoods
card.text: Whenever The Feller of Greatwoods enters or attacks, you may sacrifice two noncreature permanents. For each permanent sacrificed this way, reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Kindly Greatwood
card.text: Reach When Kindly Greatwood enters, you gain 5 life and draw a card.

card.name: Primal Ruffian
card.text: Experience (Whenever this creature attacks, if it has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever Primal Ruffian attacks, if it has a +1/+1 counter on it, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. (If it had no counters on it when it attacked, this ability does not trigger.)

card.name: Oldgrove Nurturer
card.text: Oldgrove Nurturer enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. {G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

card.name: Reclamation Sage
card.text: When Reclamation Sage enters, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Malicious Growth
card.text: When Malicious Growth enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control. {1}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste and vigilance until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Dovon, Verdant Experimenter
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. {BG}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If that card is a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Dovon, Verdant Experimenter and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Unexplored Regions
card.text: Enchant land When Unexplored Regions enters, draw a card. Enchanted land is an artifact in addition to its other types and has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Powercell Cultivator
card.text: When Powercell Cultivator enters, create a tapped colorless Powercell artifact token with "{T}: Add {C}." Artifacts you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Herald of Might
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your end step, if there are two or more +1/+1 counters among creatures you control, return Herald of Might from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Forest Fellowship
card.text: You may put a creature or land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Then each opponent may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. If one does, you may repeat this process.

card.name: Hunt the Monstrous
card.text: Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Ancient of the Glade
card.text: When Ancient of the Glade enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: That creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Reconstruct
card.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Perpetual Motion Machine
card.text: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target player mills two cards.

card.name: Iron Signet
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Harmony Array
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target opponent exiles a nonland, nontoken permanent they control. {2}, {T}: Put target permanent card exiled with Harmony Array onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Mana Rose
card.text: When Mana Rose enters, you gain 2 life and scry 2. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Hub of Innovation
card.text: Hub of Innovation enters tapped. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more artifacts, draw a card. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Cosmic Chart
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Cosmic Chart: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Unity Spheres

card.text: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.) Equip {2}

card.text: Activated abilities of artifacts cost {2} more to activate.

card.name: Warded Tome
card.text: Warded Tome doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Draw a card. {5}: Untap Warded Tome.

card.text: Flying {1}, Sacrifice Gearcraft Observer: Look at target player's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Gilded Spyglass
card.text: {3}, {T}: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Gilded Gearhulk
card.text: Haste When Gilded Gearhulk enters, you may destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent.

card.name: Junktrawler
card.text: When Junktrawler enters, create a tapped colorless Powercell artifact token with "{T}: Add {C}." Tap another untapped artifact you control: Junktrawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Colossal Achievement
card.text: Trample Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice Colossal Achievement.

card.name: Manaflux Battery
card.text: Manaflux Battery enters tapped. {T}: Add {C}{C}. {2}, {T}: Untap each other artifact you control.

card.name: Artisan's Genius
card.text: When Artisan's Genius enters, you may tap three untapped artifacts or other enchantments you control. If you do, draw three cards. {5}{W}{U}, Exile Artisan's Genius: Return any number of artifact or enchantment cards with different names from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Extravagant Flair
card.text: Choose one or both — • Counter target spell. • Exile target permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Twisted Speaker
card.text: Flash When Twisted Speaker enters, return target spell to its owner's hand. That spell's controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Formless Wanderer
card.text: Hexproof Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, each opponent discards a card and loses 3 life.

card.name: Iken Troubleshooter
card.text: Sabotage — Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, Iken Troubleshooter deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Omegalomania
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Omegalomania deals 2 damage to any target. Whenever a permanent you don't control dealt damage this way dies this turn, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.

card.name: Seeker of Battle
card.text: Whenever Seeker of Battle attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Claim for Civilization
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. {5}{G}{W}, Exile Claim for Civilization from your graveyard: Create a 6/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Acin, the Toymaker
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal a creature card from your hand. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 1/1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Deliver from Dilapidation
card.text: When Deliver from Dilapidation enters, you may sacrifice any number of enchantments. Whenever you sacrifice an enchantment this way, destroy target creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, return target enchantment card with mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Embrace the Veil
card.text: When Embrace the Veil enters, you may exile target nonland permanent you don't control until Embrace the Veil leaves the battlefield. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, you may put a card exiled with Embrace the Veil into its owner's graveyard and return Embrace the Veil to its owner's hand.

card.name: Exuberant Inventor
card.text: Eureka! (At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.) At the beginning of your first end step each turn, you get an additional end step after this step.

card.name: Jessica Turin, Battlemage
card.text: Hexproof At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent was dealt 4 or more damage this turn, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Supplanter of Realities
card.text: Whenever Supplanter of Realities attacks, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another kind of a counter already there.) Sacrifice another permanent: Supplanter of Realities gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Veil's Recovery
card.text: Choose one— • Destroy target permanent with mana value 2. • Return target permanent card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Exile Veil's Recovery.

card.name: Herald of Unity
card.text: Haste Herald of Unity's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Flare Blitz
card.text: When Flare Blitz enters, it deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life. {1}{R}{W}: Return Flare Blitz to its owner's hand.

card.name: Imagination Unleashed
card.text: Whenever you tap an artifact or land for mana, add one mana of any type that permanent produced.

card.name: The Lost Titan
card.text: Hexproof Whenever an opponent casts a spell or draws a card, draw a card.

card.name: Mirror of Possibilities DOA
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Powercell DOA
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Petal-Weaver Alexa
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Alia Emblem DOA
card.text: {W}, Pay X life: Exile target creature with power X or less.

card.name: Siraj Emblem DOA
card.text: Whenever you target one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents.

card.name: Timeworn Crags
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Timeworn Crags: Destroy target nonbasic land. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each nonbasic land you don't control.

card.name: Transplanted Citadel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {7}: Transplanted Citadel becomes a 6/6 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each artifact you control.

card.name: Renewal Grove
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Renewal Grove: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If Renewal Grove entered since your last upkeep, that land doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Riftway to the Other Side
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Add {C} for each basic land you control.

card.name: Nebula of Empty Gold
card.text: As Nebula of Empty Gold enters, choose two or three colors. You lose life equal to the number of colors chosen this way. {T}: Add one mana of any of the chosen colors.

card.name: Runecrested Valley
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library. You may put one of them into your graveyard. Put the rest back on top in any order. If you control eight or more lands, draw a card.

card.name: Sealed Riftway
card.text: When Sealed Riftway enters, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sealed Riftway: Exile target player's graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: City Gate
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice City Gate: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control that attacked this turn.

card.name: Cultivating Spheres DOA
card.text: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

card.name: Thrice-Folded Lotus DOA
card.text: {T}: Add three mana of any one color. {3}, {T}: Thrice-Folded Lotus deals 3 damage to any target.
